name: Solar Disturbance
description:
You've been sent on a mission to harvest the resources of a faraway solar system. Use your laser beam to mine asteroids and planets, and refuel as necessary by draining energy from the sun. But be careful, for if you drain the sun too much, it will become unstable and collapse into a black hole!

Audio sources:

- Sound effects from Kenney (https://www.kenney.nl/assets/sci-fi-sounds)

- Title music from yd (https://opengameart.org/content/space-music-out-there)

- Main theme from yd (https://opengameart.org/content/another-space-background-track)

- Black hole theme from yd (https://opengameart.org/content/background-space-track)
